Title: Hideaway
Writer: Dean R. Koontz (novel), Andrew Kevin Walker (screenplay), Neal Jimenez (screenplay)
Actors: Jeff Goldblum, Christine Lahti, Alicia Silverstone, Jeremy Sisto
Plot: Hatch Harrison had a traffic accident with his car. At first the doctors said he was dead but then they succeeded to bring him back to life after two hours. But Hatch starts to have strange sensations in following time and discovers that he is now united with a mad killer who had entered his mind during his death.
